Title: Luminous
Plot: Shane tries to dull her pain in the hopes that she can forget about Carmen and Jenny's blossoming relationship. Tina comes between Helena and her ex over the custody of their kids and offers a glimmer of hope to Bette. Dana and Alice call everyone to The Planet to announce their new relationship.
GuestStars: Camille Sullivan,  Mackenzie Gray,  Jordan Medina,  Kyle J. Downes,  Alyson Palmer,  Sharon Isbin,  Fabrice Grover,  Cobie Smulders,  Dan Wynands,  Tamiko Whitsett,  Elias Lucero,  Sophie Holt,  Matt McColm,  Chr
